content.raw:
`__getitem__` was implemented with the concern that we might add aliases to the names I chose rather arbitrarily based upon the row type designations from the format specification. 

Additionally, there is an mzTab 2.0 spec in development which adds more small-molecule- and metabolomics-related tables which I haven’t really looked at yet.
content.html:
__getitem__ was implemented with the concern that we might add aliases to the names I chose rather arbitrarily based upon the row type designations from the format specification.

Additionally, there is an mzTab 2.0 spec in development which adds more small-molecule- and metabolomics-related tables which I haven’t really looked at yet.
